text: [Music]
hello i'm lucas a cloud support engineer
here at the aws office in northern
virginia today i'm going to show you how
to copy an existing workspace image in
amazon workspaces from one aws account
into another aws account let's get
started after logging into the aws
management console choose the region
where the workspace image that you want
to share resides
next navigate to the workspace console
by typing workspaces into the search bar
then select the images tab on the left
hand menu
here you can see the existing workspace
images in your account
choose the image that you want to share
by clicking on the image name
the image summary page appears showing
the shared accounts box
select the add account button
finally add the account id of the
recipient aws account where you want to
share the image for use and select the
share image button
the image is now shared with the
recipient account and will be visible in
the workspace image console within the
same region
please note in order to use the shared
image the recipient account must first
copy the image
the recipient account can then use its
copy of the shared image to create
bundles for launching new workspaces
so now you know how to share an existing
amazon workspace image from one aws
account into another aws account
thank you for watching and happy cloud
computing from all of us here at aws
[Music]
